mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fixed_asset (asset_type_id, name, purchase_date, price,img_dir, status) VALUES (#{assetTypeId}, #{name}, #{purchaseDate}, #{price},#{imgDir}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE fixed_asset SET asset_type_id = #{assetTypeId}, name = #{name}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, price = #{price}, img_dir = #{imgDir}, status = #{status} WHERE asset_id = #{assetId}
mapper.select: SELECT fa.*, at.asset_type_id as "assetType.assetTypeId", at.type_name as "assetType.typeName", at.description as "assetType.description" FROM fixed_asset fa LEFT JOIN asset_type at ON fa.asset_type_id = at.asset_type_id WHERE fa.asset_id = #{assetId}

SELECT fa.*, at.asset_type_id as "assetType.assetTypeId", at.type_name as "assetType.typeName", at.description as "assetType.description" FROM fixed_asset fa LEFT JOIN asset_type at ON fa.asset_type_id = at.asset_type_id
SELECT fa.name, COUNT(fa.name) AS num FROM fixed_asset fa where fa.status = '闲置' GROUP BY fa.name

SELECT fa.*, at.asset_type_id AS "assetType.assetTypeId", at.type_name AS "assetType.typeName", at.description AS "assetType.description" FROM fixed_asset fa LEFT JOIN asset_type at ON fa.asset_type_id = at.asset_type_id WHERE fa.name = #{name} LIMIT #{num}
